rows.label: qst200411_msg0001
rows.name:
Well, for now, what we've learned
from the townspeople is...

rows.label: qst200411_msg0002
rows.name:
They said that a guy who feigns
injury to extort money is in league
with a doctor named Celian, mo.

rows.label: qst200411_msg0003
rows.name:
And, that doctor has connections
with a loan shark named Arreth...

rows.label: qst200411_msg0004
rows.name:
There were also rumors that they're
charging high medical fees.

rows.label: qst200411_msg0005
rows.name:
And, that doctor and loan shark
are meeting late at night in
the Old City of Elgria...

rows.label: qst200411_msg0006
rows.name:
This means doctor and loan
shark and everyone are all
working together, mo!

rows.label: qst200411_msg0007
rows.name:
But this alone isn't enough
evidence to have them arrested.

rows.label: qst200411_msg0009
rows.name:
We will go to the Old City
of Elgria at night and
catch them in the act.

rows.label: qst200411_msg0010
rows.name:
Once we have the evidence, they
can be judged as we see fit.

rows.label: qst200411_msg0011
rows.name: True, that would be the quickest way...

rows.label: qst200411_msg0012
rows.name: ...But will it go so easily, mo?

rows.label: qst200411_msg0013
rows.name:
Moping around here
won't get us anywhere.

rows.label: qst200411_msg0014
rows.name:
In any case, just as Vasara
says, let's go to the Old City
of Elgria when night falls.

rows.label: qst200411_msg0017
rows.name:
It will be dangerous, so
Ellenora-san, please wait at home!

rows.label: qst200411_msg0018
rows.name:
I understand... Please
be careful, everyone.
